00015 t_layer::t_layer(t_image *img): image(img)
00016 {
00017     grid= new t_grid(img->width/GRIDGRANULARITY, img->height/GRIDGRANULARITY);
00018     particles= new t_particles(grid);

00027 void t_layer::render(float x, float y, float w, float h)
00028 {
00029     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00030     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00031     if(image->showgrid) grid->render(x,y, w,h);
00032     particles->render(x,y, w,h);
00033     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00034 }
